SET(MAJOR 1)
SET(MINOR 11)
SET(REVISION 1)
SET(NAME taglib)
SET(PACKAGE ${NAME}-${MAJOR}.${MINOR}.${REVISION})

EXTERNALPROJECT_ADD(${NAME}
    DEPENDS zlib
    URL http://taglib.github.io/releases/${PACKAGE}.tar.gz TIMEOUT 30
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/local
    CMAKE_ARGS -G ${CMAKE_GENERATOR} -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DBUILD_BINDINGS=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR> -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}
)
